videoSnippet.title: Michael Adams is Forever
videoSnippet.description:
Download Mproov and Improve Your Chess Today! https://app.mproov.me/AgadYouTube1

Search all my videos easy https://agadmator-library.github.io/

Photos by Lennart Ootes

Adams, Michael (2661) - Bartel, Mateusz (2659) 
London Chess Classic (chess24.com) [3] 2023.12.03
B12 Caro-Kann, advance variation

1.e4 c6 2.d4 d5 3.e5 Bf5 4.Nf3 e6 5.Be2 Nd7 6.O-O a5 7.a4 f6 8.Be3 Qb6 9.Nbd2 fxe5 10.Nxe5 Nxe5 11.dxe5 Bc5 12.Bxc5 Qxc5 13.Nb3 Qe7 14.Bh5+ g6 15.Be2 h5 16.Qd2 Qc7 17.Bd3 Nh6 18.Nd4 Qe7 19.Ra3 Bxd3 20.Rxd3 Nf5 21.Nxf5 gxf5 22.c4 Kf7 23.cxd5 exd5 24.Re1 Ke6 25.Rg3 Qf7 26.b4 h4 27.Rb3 f4 28.bxa5 Rag8 29.Qb4 Rh7 30.Qd6+ Kf5 31.Rxb7 Qxb7 32.Qf6+ Kg4 33.Qe6+ Kh5 34.Qxg8 Rg7 35.Qf8 d4 36.e6 c5 37.Qxg7

judgment.name: Inaccuracy
judgment.comment: Checkmate is now unavoidable. Kg6 was best.

analysis.variation: Re5+ Rg5 Qh8+ Kg6 Qg8+ Kh6 Qxg5+ Kh7 Qxh4+ Kg7 Qg4+ Kf8 Rf5+ Ke8

judgment.name: Inaccuracy
judgment.comment: Lost forced checkmate sequence. Re5+ was best.
